paramTypes.name: InitialMin
paramTypes.desc: Minumum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire

paramTypes.name: InitialMax
paramTypes.desc: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Initial Expire

paramTypes.name: RepeatMin
paramTypes.desc: Minimum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

paramTypes.name: RepeatMax
paramTypes.desc: Maximum Time used to calculate Random Repeat Expire

paramTypes.name: HPMax%
paramTypes.desc: Maximum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: HPMin%
paramTypes.desc: Minimum HP% That will trigger this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: ManaMax%
paramTypes.desc: Maximum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: ManaMin%
paramTypes.desc: Minimum Mana% That will trigger this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: SpellID
paramTypes.desc: The Spell ID that will trigger the Event.

paramTypes.name: School
paramTypes.desc: Spell School to trigger the Event.

paramTypes.name: MinDist
paramTypes.desc: This Distance is the Minimum Distance between the NPC and it's target to allow this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: MaxDist
paramTypes.desc: This Distance is the Maximum Distance between the NPC and it's target to allow this Event to Expire

paramTypes.name: Hostile-or-Not
paramTypes.desc: This will expire if Unit are hostile. If Param1=1 it will only expire if Unit are not Hostile(generally determined by faction)

paramTypes.name: MaxAllowedRange
paramTypes.desc: Expires when a Unit moves within this distance to creature

paramTypes.name: HPDeficit
paramTypes.desc: This is the Amount of HP Missing from Full HP to trigger this event (You would need to calculate the amount of HP the event happens and subtract that from Full HP Value to get this number)

paramTypes.name: Radius
paramTypes.desc: This is the Range in Yards the NPC will scan for nearby Friendlies (Faction is Friendly To) for the missing amount of HP in Param1.

events.name: EVENT_T_TIMER_IN_COMBAT
events.d1: Expires at first between (Param1) and (Param2) and then will repeat between every (Param3) and (Param4),  EXPIRES ONLY IN COMBAT.

events.name: EVENT_T_TIMER_OOC
events.d1: Expires at first between (Param1) and (Param2) and then will repeat between every (Param3) and (Param4),  EXPIRES ONLY OUT OF COMBAT BUT NOT DURING EVADE.

events.name: EVENT_T_HP
events.d1: Expires when the NPC's HP% is between (Param1) and (Param2). Will repeat between every (Param3) and (Param4) If Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_MANA
events.d1: Expires when the NPC's Mana% is between (Param1) and (Param2). Will repeat between every (Param3) and (Param4) If Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_AGGRO
events.d1: Expires ONLY upon the NPC's INITIAL Aggro at the Start of Combat (Does NOT Repeat) and Only Resets on Spawn or Evade.

events.name: EVENT_T_KILL
events.d1: Expires upon Killing a Player. Will Repeat Check between (Param1) and (Param2). This Event Will Not Trigger Again Until Repeat Timer Expires.

events.name: EVENT_T_DEATH
events.d1: Expires on the NPC's Death. (This Triggers At The Moment The NPC Dies).

events.name: EVENT_T_EVADE
events.d1: Expires at the moment the Creature EnterEvadeMode() and Exits Combat.

events.name: EVENT_T_SPELLHIT
events.d1: Expires upon Spell Hit of the NPC. When (param1) is set, it is the specific Spell ID used as the trigger. With (param2) specified, the expiration is limited to specific spell schools (-1 for all) and Spell ID value is ignored. Will repeat Event Conditions Check between every (Param3) and (Param4). Only A Spell ID or Spell School may be Specified but NOT both.

events.name: EVENT_T_RANGE
events.d1: Expires when the Highest Threat Target Distance is Greater than (Param1) and Less than (Param2). Will repeat between every (Param3) and (Param4) if Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_OOC_LOS
events.d1: Expires when a unit moves within distance (MaxAllowedRange) of the NPC. If (Param1) is 0 it will expire only when unit is hostile, If (Param1) is 1 it will expire only when unit is friendly. This depends generally on faction relations. Will repeat every (Param3) and (Param4). Does NOT expire when the NPC is in combat.

events.name: EVENT_T_SPAWNED
events.d1: Expires on initial spawn and respawn of the NPC (Useful for setting Ranged Movement/Summoning Pets/Applying Buffs).

events.name: EVENT_T_TARGET_HP
events.d1: Expires when current target's HP% is between (Param1) and (Param2). Will repeat every (Param3) and (Param4)If Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_TARGET_CASTING
events.d1: Expires when the current target is casting a spell. Will repeat every (Param1) and (Param2) If Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_FRIENDLY_HP
events.d1: Expires when a friendly unit in (Radius) has at least (Param1) HP points missing. Will repeat every (Param3) and (Param4) If Event Conditions Are Still Met.

events.name: EVENT_T_FRIENDLY_IS_CC
events.d1: Expires when a friendly unit is crowd controlled within the given Radius (Param2). Will repeat every (Param3) and (Param4).
